channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 13:08 Driven Alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 🟢 13:08 Driven Alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.#Sumy_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 13:05 Flashing anxiety in Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
